rules_text:
Counter target spell.
Madness {1}{U}{U} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Lack of Skepticism, Belief based solely on plausibility, Men in Black — A Series of Simple Tests

Mechanical Uniqueness — Sorcery speed countermagic.

**Designer’s note — Make sure there’s at least one card somewhere in the set that lets this work.

Assistance — Flash granters (electrodominance)
